title: Latest Version 5.1.62 - CALCULATEM PRO 2008
description:
Calculatem Pro? Texas Holdem Odds Calculator
Instant Texas Holdem pot odds are just one of the unbeatable advantages of Calculatem Pro? - an advanced poker odds calculator that gives real-time hand odds and pot odds directly on the table as you play.


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hand Odds AND Pot Odds
Simple odds calculators just can&#039;t manage the complexity needed to generate advanced hand and pot odds - absolutely critical factors in winning poker. CalculatemPro? can. 

Valuable In-Game Advice
CalculatemPro? uses advanced mathematical algorithms to consider multiple variables -opponents, position, fold depth, pot odds - so you get the most accurate advice possible. Never make isolated - and costly - moves based on hands odds alone. 

Ability to Act Quicker and Smarter
Never waste time and energy calculating odds in your head. Calculatem Pro lets you use time to your advantage: Find tells. Steal more pots. Focus entirely on fine-tuning your game for maximum profit. 

Customized to Your Playing Style
Want to be a strictly tight-aggressive player? Never want to call in the small blind unless your hand is in the top 5%? Set up CalculatemPro? exactly to your preferred style and adjust easily as the game develops.
